body:
Ubuntu 20.04
Bitcoin Core v0.20.1

I start bitcoind as follow:
`./bin/bitcoind -conf=/home/blockchain/bitcoin-0.20.1/bitcoin.conf  -reindex`

After reindex done, and sync to the latest block, I stop bitcoind with cmd as below:
`./bin/bitcoin-cli -conf=/home/blockchain/bitcoin-0.20.1/bitcoin.conf stop`

And now I start bitcoind again without -reindex and it shows inconsistencies error, and told me need to reindex again.
